posting_body: ['Whether you invite friends over for a day at the pool or to show off your grill-master skills in the barbecue pavilion, Azures Apartment Homes embraces laid-back luxury and the modern comforts of today.', 'Our spacious apartment homes are outfitted with luxe details from wood-style flooring to stone countertops.', 'Plus, residents enjoy an array of indoor and outdoor amenities including a gym and fully equipped resident social lounge.', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Built-in desks', '-Lush landscaped grounds', '-Ceiling fans in living areas Select units', '-State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity', '-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi', '-Eco-friendly community features', '-Flexible lease terms available', '-Views', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
